metadata.title: CVE-2020-27223 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty 9.4.6.v20170531 to 9.4.36.v20210114 (inclusive), 10.0.0,and 11.0.0 when Jetty handles a request containing multiple Accept headerswith a large number of “quality” (i.e. q) parameters, the server may entera denial of service (DoS) state due to high CPU usage processing thosequality values, resulting in minutes of CPU time exhausted processing thosequality values.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
